attributes.action: Ask the UK Government to reject Article 22 of the EU draft guidelines.
attributes.additional_details:
I am an ordinary British citizen living in the Netherlands and together with other fellow gibraltarians decided to start this petition.

As no clear statements are forthcoming both from H.M gov. UK and H.M gov Gibraltar regarding this grave matter.
attributes.background:
.
The draft contains  an Article that states """after the final agreement between the UK, Gibraltar will not be included in that agreement and Spain and the UK will negotiate a special deal when it concerns Gibraltar.
And Spain and only Spain can have a veto on Gibraltar.
